column5: Shop burnt to the ground while he was out for supper.
Heard that this morning heading into work Wayne. He does great work and has been around for along time. Hope he gets back up and running.
Wow that sucks. Stopped in there one time to get a quote, he had lots of neat stuff around, I was impressed  by the work (never did get that replica done!)
Geez, I just drove by there yesterday afternoon.
Wow, that's sad to hear.  I only have two trophy mounts and both were done by Jeff back in the 80's.  Really beautiful job, both of 'em, and holding up nicely to this day.  Glad Jeff's ok.
My hunting partner used him last year.  And was very happy with his work.  Certainly hope he gets back on his feet again soon!
